name: Dr. Posto Tablet
description:
👉🏻 D𝐫. P𝐫o𝐬t𝐨 𝐓a𝐛l𝐞t𝐬 – 𝐇e𝐫b𝐚l P𝐫o𝐬t𝐚t𝐞 𝐒u𝐩p𝐨r𝐭

What is Dr. Prosto Tablets
• Dr. Prosto Tablets are a herbal Ayurvedic supplement designed to support prostate health and urinary function.
• It is formulated using traditional herbs and is intended for daily wellness, not as a pharmaceutical drug.

Key Ingredients
• Kanchnar – Traditionally used to support prostate size balance and healthy urinary flow.
• Guggul – Known for anti-inflammatory properties and prostate wellness support.
• Green Tea Extract – Rich in antioxidants that help protect cells from oxidative stress.
• Curcuminoids – Active compounds from turmeric that support inflammation control and overall comfort.

Primary Benefits
• Supports healthy urinary flow
• Helps maintain prostate comfort
• Assists in reducing inflammation naturally
• Provides antioxidant support
• Suitable for long-term use as per Ayurvedic principles

Who Should Use
• Adult men experiencing urinary discomfort or prostate-related concerns
• Men looking for natural prostate wellness support
• Not recommended for children or women without medical advice

How to Use
• Take 1 tablet twice daily after meals
• Or use as directed by a qualified healthcare professional

Product Nature
• Herbal / Ayurvedic formulation
• Non-habit forming
• No synthetic drugs (as per brand claim)

Important Disclaimer
• This product is not a substitute for medical treatment
• Effectiveness may vary from person to person
• Always consult a doctor if you have an existing medical condition or are on medication
